K14sumagavu:1: SumAv_1: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājāmātyair dhanibhiḥ
K14sumagavu:2: pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍair gandharvaiḥ
K14sumagavu:6: SumAv_2: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śrāvastyām anāthapiṇḍado nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty
K14sumagavu:7: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī.
K14sumagavu:8: SumAv_3: tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītam. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati.
K14sumagavu:9: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā. sāṣṭānāṃ navānāṃ
K14sumagavu:12: abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā,
K14sumagavu:14: SumAv_5: puṇḍravardhane 'pi ca nagare mūṣilo nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
K14sumagavu:18: SumAv_7: yadā bhagavatānuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ tadā sarve 'nyatīrthyā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ pratyantaṃ samāśritāḥ,
K14sumagavu:24: kim arthaṃ tvaṃ no vivāhayasīti. sa provāca:
K14sumagavu:25: patnī me sadṛśī na vidyate. ta ūcur:
K14sumagavu:29: SumAv_9: tato 'sau sahaśravaṇād eva tasyāṃ saṃraktacitto babhūva. yāvad anyatīrthikaveśaṃ kṛtvānupūrveṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ,
K14sumagavu:30: piṇḍapātram anuvicarann anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ. sumāgadhā bhikṣāṃ gṛhītvā
K14sumagavu:31: nirgatā. sā tena dṛṣṭā. sahadarśanād evātīva saṃraktacitto babhūva. sa bhrāntena
K14sumagavu:34: SumAv_10: tataḥ sumāgadhā tam asaṃvṛtendriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahasitā,
K14sumagavu:35: āha ca: asaṃprajānā ime 'nyatīrthyā bhikṣāṃ pratigṛhṇantīti. tataḥ so 'pi tayā saha prahasito bhikṣāṃ gṛhītvā prakrāntaḥ.
K14sumagavu:36: SumAv_11: tataḥ puṇḍravardhanaṃ gatvā pitur niveditavān. tena sā dārikā śrāvastīṃ gatvā yācitā.
K14sumagavu:37: SumAv_12: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā bhagavān pṛsṭaḥ. bhagavān āha: gṛhapate,
K14sumagavu:38: pravrajitām idam akaraṇīyam. api tu yadi sumāgadhā puṇḍravardhanaṃ yāsyati,
K14sumagavu:40: SumAv_13: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā sumāgadhā mahatā śrisamudayena vṛṣabhadattāya dattā,
K14sumagavu:42: SumAv_14: yāvad apareṇa samayena tasmin gṛhe nirgranthā bhuñjate,
K14sumagavu:46: nūnaṃ sthavirāryaśāradvatīputramahāmaudgalyāyanāryānandaprabhṛtayo mahāśrāvakā upanimantritā iti. sā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā nirgatā.
K14sumagavu:47: SumAv_16: tayā te nirgranthāḥ kākapakṣamalinā malapaṭalavastrā durgandhaśarīrā nagnāḥ pretasadṛśā dṛṣṭvā ca punar durmanāḥ saṃvṛttā.
K14sumagavu:50: yady evaṃvidhā dakṣinīyāḥ. pāpakārinaḥ punaḥ kīdṛśā bhavantīti.
K14sumagavu:54: asti śrāvastyāṃ pitur me vihāre sa bhagavān upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddhaḥ,
K14sumagavu:58: sa bhagavān āḍhyāt kulāt pravrajito 'dīnāt. punar aparaṃ,
K14sumagavu:60: SumAv_20: yasmin samaye krīḍāharṣamaṇḍanavibhūṣaṇasthānayogam anuyuktena vihartavyam,
K14sumagavu:61: tasmin samaye 'kāmakānāṃ jñātīnām sāśrukaṇṭhānāṃ rudanmukhānāṃ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāśāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayāgārād anagārikāṃ
K14sumagavu:63: bhagavān dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato 'sītyanuvyañjanair virājitagātro vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaḥ,
K14sumagavu:65: jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako 'bhirūpako darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ.
K14sumagavu:74: alam utpannānāṃ paravādināṃ saha dharmeṇa nirgṛhītā,
K14sumagavu:82: SumAv_25: āryadharmatayā nyāyadharmatayā virajadharmatayā atuladharmatayā labdhasahāyaḥ sa bhagavān,
K14sumagavu:83: bahavo 'sya sahāyakāḥ śīlasaṃpannāḥ samādhisaṃpannāḥ prajñāsaṃpannā vimuktisaṃpannā vimuktijñānasaṃpannāḥ.
K14sumagavu:85: sa bhagavān yaṃ grāmakṣetram upaniśritya viharati,
K14sumagavu:86: na tatra manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā viheṭhayanti,
K14sumagavu:90: devaḥ kālena kālaṃ samyag vāridhārām anuprayacchatīti.
K14sumagavu:91: SumAv_27: tasyāḥ sahaśravaṇād eva bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasannaṃ,
K14sumagavu:93: śakyasi tvaṃ taṃ bhagavantam asmākam upadarśayitum.
K14sumagavu:96: śvo 'haṃ bhagavantam ānayisyāmīti. mūṣilapatnī kathayati: sādhu,
K14sumagavu:98: SumAv_29: tataḥ sumāgadhā bhavanapṛṣṭham abhiruhya maṇḍalakam upalipya puṣpāṇy avakīrya bhagavantam abhinamasya yasyāṃ diśi prativasati tasyāṃ diśi puṣpāṇi kṣipati,
K14sumagavu:100: bhṛṅgārodakaṃ ca bhagavato nimantraṇakaṃ preṣayati. evam āha:
K14sumagavu:101: SumAv_30: sarvajña kāruṇika bho khalu sāṃprataṃ me saṃdarśanaṃ svayam ihāgamanaṃ kurusva /
K14sumagavu:102: saṃghena sāgarasamena samaṃ jitāre āgāminīṃ prativasasva niśām atulyam //
K14sumagavu:103: anugrahārthaṃ bhagavan mamādya kartuṃ narāṇāṃ manasaḥ prasādaṃ /
K14sumagavu:104: rūpasya te darśanamātrakena lokaikanātha kriyatāṃ prasādaḥ //
K14sumagavu:105: SumAv_31: tatas tāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena haṃsapaṅktir ivākāśe jetavanābhimukhāni saṃprasthitāni,
K14sumagavu:107: SumAv_32: taṃ dṛṣṭvāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantaṃ papracha:
K14sumagavu:119: SumAv_34: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya gaṇḍīm ākoṭya bhikṣusaṃghaṃ saṃnipātya vṛddhānte sthitvā śalākāṃ cārayann evam
K14sumagavu:122: SumAv_35: śvo yuṣmābhiḥ puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaraṃ gantavyaṃ,
K14sumagavu:129: SumAv_36: tataḥ sthavirasthavirāḥ śalākāṃ grahītum ārabdhāḥ. tatra pūrṇo nāma sukuṇḍopadhānīyaḥ sthaviraḥ,
K14sumagavu:130: so 'pi śalākāṃ grahītum ārabdhaḥ. āyuṣmatānandenocyate: sthavira,
K14sumagavu:132: api tu puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaraṃ gantavyaṃ ṣaṣṭyuttarayojanaśataṃ yāvad ṛddhivikurvaṇaṃ kartavyam.
K14sumagavu:133: SumAv_37: tataḥ sasaṃbhramaṃ sthaviraḥ śalākāṃ chorayitvā,
K14sumagavu:134: yāvad dvitīyasya bhikṣoḥ śalākā na dīyate,
K14sumagavu:135: tāvat ṣaḍabhijñām utpādya gajabhujasadṛśaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya śalākāṃ gṛhītvā kathayati:
K14sumagavu:136: na hi rūpaguṇair na hi sauṣṭhavair na balātkāraguṇair na gauravāt /
K14sumagavu:137: jarayā hi nipīḍitayauvanāḥ ṣaḍabhijñās tu bhavanti madvidhāḥ //
K14sumagavu:138: SumAv_38: tataḥ prabhatāyām rajanyāṃ sthavirasthavirāḥ svakasvakena ṛddhyanubhāvena saṃprasthitāḥ.
K14sumagavu:139: SumAv_39: atha mūṣilapatnī bhagavato 'rthe śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīyāsanakāni prajñapya,
K14sumagavu:142: sumāgadhāpi svāminā sārdhaṃ śvaśureṇa bahiḥ sthitā cintayati.
K14sumagavu:143: SumAv_40: kiṃ bhagavān āgamiṣyati. atha nāgamisyatīti. athavānyatropanimantrito bhaviṣyati.
K14sumagavu:144: SumAv_41: tato bhagavantaṃ namaskṛtya yasyāṃ diśi prativasati tām diśaṃ prekṣitum ārabdhā.
K14sumagavu:145: SumAv_42: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān ājñātakauṇḍinya uragaratham abhinirmāya śanair mandaṃ
K14sumagavu:146: mandaṃ deve vṛṣṭāyamāne vidyutsu niścarantīṣu meghadhvaninirnādena tatropaviṣṭa upari
K14sumagavu:148: SumAv_43: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:150: yo 'yam uragarathopaviṣṭaḥ śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ deve vṛṣṭāyamāne vidyududdyotaṃ darśayamāno meghadhvaninirnādena ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:153: anena bhagavatā bārāṇasyāṃ dharme deśyamāne tatprathamato vairāgyam adhigatam ayaṃ bhagavatā nirvāṇādhigamaprāptānām agro nirdiṣṭah,
K14sumagavu:155: SumAv_45: atrāntareṇāyuṣmāñ chāriputraḥ siṃharatham abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā rddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:156: SumAv_46: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:161: SumAv_48: asya ca garbhasthasya mātrā jambūdvīpe sarvavādino nirgṛhītāḥ.
K14sumagavu:163: apy evāhaṃ sumerumūrdhāruhya caturṇām api ratnākarāṇāṃ payaḥ pibeyam iti.
K14sumagavu:164: SumAv_50: atha tiṣyena dvijapravareṇendrajālapāramiprāptaṃ harim indrajālācāryam āhūya narasurāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragagandharvayakṣasamavāye devyā dauhadaṃ vinītam.
K14sumagavu:165: SumAv_51: asya ca mātuḥ kukṣiniṣkrāntasya pitrā sarvanaimittikāḥ samāhūyoktāḥ:
K14sumagavu:168: SumAv_52: te cāvalokayitum ārabdhāḥ. kumārasya lakṣaṇodāratāṃ rūpodāratāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannā,
K14sumagavu:169: na śaknuvanti vyākartuṃ kumārasyedaṃ prabhāvam iti.
K14sumagavu:170: SumAv_53: athāmbaragatena mahābrāhmaṇā teṣām saṃśayam apanayanārthaṃ brāhmaṇasvareṇāvaghoṣitam.
K14sumagavu:171: SumAv_54: eṣa kumāraḥ śākyamuneḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kariṣyati,
K14sumagavu:174: SumAv_55: idānīṃ vādinaś cāsya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya cirakālābhilaṣitāṃ vācam api na niścārayanti,
K14sumagavu:175: kaḥ punar vādo. vādakaraṇe ayaṃ bhagavatā evam uktaḥ.
K14sumagavu:179: asyāḥ pṛthivyās tṛṇakāsṭhaśākhāparṇasadapramāṇaṃ kalamānāṃ parikṣayaṃ paryāyena gacchet,
K14sumagavu:180: na tv evāsya śāriputrasya prajñāyāḥ kṣayaṃ vadāmi. ato mahāprajña ity ākhyātaḥ mahāsārthavāhavat.
K14sumagavu:181: SumAv_57: yāvat sarvasattveṣu prajñā 'sya sarvotkṛṣṭā yāvat tribhuvavāsisakalanarāmarasurasya
K14sumagavu:185: caturāryasatyasaṃkṣepavistaravibhāgavidhikathāvasare nāsty utpattiṣv asya samo jagati pratyekabuddho 'pi,
K14sumagavu:187: SumAv_59: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ sauvarṇaṃ parvatam abhinirmāya nānāmṛgagaṇopetaṃ
K14sumagavu:188: nānāprasravākulaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇākīrṇaṃ nānāvṛkṣopaśobhitaṃ tatropaviṣṭaḥ sa upari
K14sumagavu:190: SumAv_60: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:191: ayaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ suvarṇam parvatam abhiruhyāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:194: 'yaṃ bhagavatā alpecchānāṃ saṃtuṣṭānāṃ dhūtaguṇadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
K14sumagavu:207: iti kṛtvā, pratigṛhītāśeṣā yā aparigraha iti na gṛhītaḥ. yaś ca bhāgineyām abhirūpāṃ darśanīyāṃ janapadakalyāṇīsadṛśīṃ tām apahāya pravrajitaḥ,
K14sumagavu:210: hastinam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:211: SumAv_65: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:216: SumAv_67: anena śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayantaḥ prāsādaḥ,
K14sumagavu:220: SumAv_68: nandopanandau nāma nāgarājānau sumerubhṛguṇapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvāvasthitau ca vinītau.
K14sumagavu:221: SumAv_69: punar apy anena bhagavān evam uktaḥ:
K14sumagavu:222: evaṃ hi bhadanta vaijayante durbhikṣaṃ kṛcchraṃ kāntāraṃ,
K14sumagavu:225: SumAv_70: saṃmukhaṃ me bhadanta bhagavato 'ntikāc chrutaṃ saṃmukham udgṛhītam:
K14sumagavu:228: SumAv_71: tad icchāmy asyā mahāpṛthivyāḥ pārthivaḥ praṇīto rasadhātuḥ tam ūrdhvaṃ kartuṃ,
K14sumagavu:235: ye pṛthivīsaṃniśritāḥ prāṇinas tān kathaṃ kariṣyasīti. eṣa evam āha:
K14sumagavu:236: ye pṛthivīsaṃniśritāḥ prāṇinas tān vāmena pāṇinoddhṛtya dhārayiṣyāmi,
K14sumagavu:237: dakṣiṇena prāṇinā mahāpṛthivīṃ parivartayiṣyāmi. bhagavān āha:
K14sumagavu:241: balavān puruṣaḥ kadalīpatraṃ parivartayan paramalaghusaṃjñī bhavati,
K14sumagavu:246: śakyasi tvam anayā ṛddhyānenopāyena mahāpṛthivīṃ parivartayitum iti. sa eṣāgacchati. (4)
K14sumagavu:247: SumAv_77: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ sphaṭikamayaṃ kūṭāgāram abhinirmāya marakatenācchāditaṃ nānāratnastambhopanibaddhaṃ pravālavedikopaśobhitaṃ,
K14sumagavu:248: tatra paryaṇkaḥ prajñaptaḥ paṭikāstṛto goṇikāstṛtaś citrikāstṛtaś tūlikāstṛtaḥ,
K14sumagavu:251: SumAv_78: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:252: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ kūṭāgāram abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:255: ayaṃ bhagavatā sūtrāntavaibhaṅgakānāṃ puṇyamaheśākhyānām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ,
K14sumagavu:257: SumAv_80: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān mahākausṭhilo vrṣabharatham abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:258: SumAv_81: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:267: nābhijānāmi sabrahmacāriṇām antikāt parikarma svīkartum antaśaḥ pṛṣṭhodgharṣaṇamātram api,
K14sumagavu:269: SumAv_84: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān upālī haimaṃ tālavanam abhinirmāya suvarṇapuṣpaphalopetaṃ vividhamanojñasvarasaṃyuktaṃ,
K14sumagavu:271: SumAv_85: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:272: 'yam te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ haimaṃ tālavanam āśritya ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:276: SumAv_87: asya ca pañcamātrātraiḥ śākyakumāraśatair nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitaiḥ pravrajyamānaiḥ purastād vastrāṇām ābharaṇānāṃ ca mahān rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ.
K14sumagavu:278: ime tāvat kumārāḥ kulavibhavayauvanopetāḥ sphītāny antaḥpurāṇi sphītāṇi ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇy apāsya pravrajitum ārabdhāḥ,
K14sumagavu:280: SumAv_89: 'nena vyasanam āpatsyate iti tāṃ vibhūtiṃ kheṭapiṇḍam ivāpahāya pravrajya tatprathamataram arhattvam adhigataṃ,
K14sumagavu:282: SumAv_90: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān aśvajic chānteneryāpathena mattahastinaṃ damayati,
K14sumagavu:284: SumAv_91: taṃ dṛsṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:285: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ śānteneryāpathena pātrakaravyagrahasta upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:288: chānteneryāpathena mattahastinaṃ damayati. asya sakāśād anayā gāthayā:
K14sumagavu:292: tat mokṣapravaraṃ sa cādivṛṣabho jñātvā svayaṃ bhāṣate //
K14sumagavu:293: śrutvā pūrvaṃ tīrthikasyāryeṇa śāriputreṇa śrotaāpattiphalam adhigatam ayaṃ bhagavatā smṛtimatām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ,
K14sumagavu:295: SumAv_93: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputraḥ sauvarṇaṃ padmam abhinirmāya sahasrapatraṃ
K14sumagavu:296: śakaṭacakramātraṃ vaiḍūryadaṇḍaṃ vajrāṅkurakeśaraṃ tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:297: SumAv_94: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:298: ayaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ sauvarnaṃ padmam abhinirmāya sahasrapatraṃ śakaṭacakramātraṃ vaiḍūryadaṇḍaṃ vajrāṅkurakeśaraṃ tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā
K14sumagavu:303: SumAv_96: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān dravyo mallaputraś catūratnamayam parvataśikharam abhinirmāya
K14sumagavu:304: nānāghaṇṭāravākīrṇaṃ nānādhvajapatākopaśohitaṃ tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:305: SumAv_97: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ:
K14sumagavu:307: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ catūratnamayaṃ parvataśikharam abhinirmāya nānāghaṇṭārāvakīrṇaṃ nānādhvajapatākopaśobhitaṃ tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā
K14sumagavu:311: yo 'yaṃ saṃlayān bhikṣūn tathā pratisaṃlayaneṣu niyojayati,
K14sumagavu:313: SumAv_99: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān aniruddhaḥ sarvasauvarṇaṃ prāsādam abhinirmāya vaiḍūryapravālastambhopaśobhitaṃ nānāratnavicitraṃ vitānamālāviracitaṃ śatapatākopaśobhitaṃ tanmadhye,
K14sumagavu:316: SumAv_100: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:317: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ sauvarṇaṃ prāsādam abhinirmāya,
K14sumagavu:318: tatra cābhyantare siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:322: SumAv_102: anena bārāṇasyām upaviṣṭasya pratyekabuddhasyaikapiṇḍapratipādanena saptakṛtvaś cakravartirājyāni kāritāni,
K14sumagavu:323: saptakṛtvo deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣu devānāṃ rājyaṃ kāritam.
K14sumagavu:325: anekāni ca śatasahasrāni lakṣāhatasya hiraṇyasuvarṇasya rūpyasya cāpahāya pravrajitaḥ,
K14sumagavu:333: nāhaṃ pravrajāmi. yas te priyaḥ putraḥ sukhāsane upari prāsādatale tiṣṭhati,
K14sumagavu:338: SumAv_107: ambe, tvaṃ tasyābhiprasannā yenāsau puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ. adya tasya mā kiṃcit preṣayājñāsyāmi puṇyamaheśākhyo na veti.
K14sumagavu:340: SumAv_109: tayā riktapiṭharikābhiḥ piṭakaṃ pūrayitvā śuklena vastreṇācchādya mudrābhilakṣitaṃ kṛtvā preṣyadārikāhaste preṣitam,
K14sumagavu:343: vaktavyṃ na kiṃcid iti. sā tam ādāya saṃprasthitā.
K14sumagavu:344: SumAv_110: śakrasya ca devānām indrasyādhastāt jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate. sa saṃlakṣayati:
K14sumagavu:345: yena nāma upari pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ,
K14sumagavu:346: tasyādya kathaṃ bhojanena vighāto bhaviṣyati. bhojanopasaṃhāro 'sya kartavya iti. tenāsau piṭako nānāsūpikarabhojanopetasyāhārasya pūritaḥ.
K14sumagavu:347: SumAv_111: yāvad asau dārikā tam ādāyāniruddhasakāśaṃ gatā,
K14sumagavu:352: riktaṃ preṣayiṣyati. nūnam atra kiṃ nāma bhojyabhojanaṃ prakṣiptam paśyāmas tāvad iti.
K14sumagavu:353: SumAv_112: yāvad udghāṭitaṃ sarvaṃ tad udyānam anekopakaraṇasurabhigandhasaṃpūrṇaṃ vyavasthitam. yaṃ ghrātvāniruddhaḥ paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ:
K14sumagavu:355: anena mātur agrapiṇḍaḥ preṣitaḥ. saṃdiṣṭaṃ cāmba,
K14sumagavu:357: SumAv_113: sā dṛṣṭvā paramavismayam upagatā. tayā mahānāmopadarśitaḥ: putra,
K14sumagavu:359: dṛṣṭam. nanu tvaṃ mayā pūrvam evoktaḥ:
K14sumagavu:361: mā tena saha spardhāṃ kurṣveti. sa eṣāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:366: mukto mocayitā nimagnam avaśaṃ lokaṃ bhavāmbho nidhau // (11)
K14sumagavu:367: SumAv_115: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇaḥ puṣpamaṇḍapam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:368: SumAv_116: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:369: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ puṣpamaṇḍapam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:373: SumAv_118: ayaṃ ratnaprayuktikayā karṇikayā karṇe āmuktikayā jātaḥ. mātāpitarau paraṃ vismayam āpannau.
K14sumagavu:374: SumAv_119: asya pitrā balasenena sarvaratnaparikṣakān āhūyoktaḥ:
K14sumagavu:375: ratnānāṃ mūlyam kuruta iti. te ratnānāṃ mūlyaṃ kartum ārabdhā,
K14sumagavu:377: SumAv_120: dharmatā khalu yasya ratnasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartuṃ,
K14sumagavu:378: tasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate. te kathayati: gṛhapate,
K14sumagavu:381: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti. ayam dārakaḥ koṭimūlyakaratnikayā karṇikayā karṇe āmuktikayā jātah,
K14sumagavu:383: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭīkarṇa iti nāma. sa eṣāgacchati. (12)
K14sumagavu:385: abhinirmāya rajodhvastāyām pṛthivyām ākāśacaṅkrame caṅkramyamāna upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:386: SumAv_123: taṃ dṣṛṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:387: 'yam te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopetam vanagahanam saṃśrityākāśacaṅkrame caṅkramyamāṇo 'bhyāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:390: āryo 'yaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśah. asya jātamātrasya pitrā viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭyaḥ avalehikāmūlye 'nupradattā,
K14sumagavu:391: asya dine dine pañcakārṣāpaṇaśatāni sthālīpākārthe vyayam upagacchati.
K14sumagavu:392: SumAv_125: āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena cāsya sakāśāt piṇḍapātram ādāya bhagavate
K14sumagavu:393: dattam. yasya gandhena sarvaṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaram āpūritaṃ pātrāvaśeṣaṃ ca rājña bimbisāreṇāsvāditam,
K14sumagavu:394: āsvādya ca paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayaty:
K14sumagavu:397: nābhijānāmi kadācid evaṃvidham annam āsvāditaṃ pūrvam.
K14sumagavu:398: SumAv_127: asya pādatale caturaṅgulamātrāṇi suvarṇāni romāni jātāni.
K14sumagavu:399: SumAv_128: ayaṃ bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gantukāmaḥ pṛcchati:
K14sumagavu:400: kiṃ bhagavān yānena gacchaty āhosvit padbhyām iti. apare kathayanti:
K14sumagavu:403: SumAv_129: tasya pauruṣeyair vastrāṇi pṛthivyām āstīrṇāni. eṣa pṛcchati:
K14sumagavu:404: kiṃ bhagavān āstīrṇena gacchaty āhosvid anāstīrṇeneti. te kathayati:
K14sumagavu:407: aham apy anāstīrṇena gacchāmīti. tair apanītāni.
K14sumagavu:408: SumAv_130: punar aparāṇi dūṣyavastrāṇi pṛthivyām āstīrṇāni. eṣa pṛcchati:
K14sumagavu:409: kiṃ bhagavān dūṣyāstīrṇena gacchaty āhosvid anāstīrṇena. te prāhuḥ:
K14sumagavu:412: SumAv_131: kumāra, puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ. tato 'parāṇy amanuṣyāni divyavastrāṇi prādurbhūtāni. eṣa dṛṣṭvāha:
K14sumagavu:413: apanayantu amanuṣyavastrāṇīti. tair apanītānī. anena pṛthivyāṃ pādo nyastaḥ. ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ.
K14sumagavu:416: ekanavatiṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācic chroṇeṇa koṭīviṃśenānastīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādo nyastaḥ. etarhi nyasto dharmagauravāt,
K14sumagavu:418: SumAv_133: yenāyaṃ ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ. ayaṃ bhagavatā ārabdhavīryāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ. sa eṣāgacchati. (13)
K14sumagavu:419: SumAv_134: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān pilindavatso haṃsaratham abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:420: SumAv_135: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha:
K14sumagavu:421: sumāgadhe 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ haṃsarathenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:426: kuśalītiṣṭhety. asya vacanasamanantaram eva gaṅgā sthitā,
K14sumagavu:427: aṅkuśasaṃtāḍiteva dviradavadhūr na prahasati. so 'yam āgacchati. (14)
K14sumagavu:428: SumAv_138: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān udāyī aśvaratham abhinirmāya catūratnopaśobhitaṃ tatropaviṣṭa,
K14sumagavu:430: SumAv_139: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:431: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yam aśvaratham abhinirmāya catūratnopaśobhitaṃ tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:433: nāyam ārya udāyī ayaṃ bhagavatā kulaprasādakānām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
K14sumagavu:434: SumAv_141: anena rājā śuddhodanaḥ śuklodano droṇodano 'mṛtodano dhautodanaś ca,
K14sumagavu:436: tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhiś cittaprahlādanībhir vividhābhir vāgbhiḥ śokaṃ parityājitāni.
K14sumagavu:438: SumAv_142: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān jyotiḥpālo mayūraratham abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhykāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:439: SumAv_143: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:440: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ mayūraratham abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:444: SumAv_145: asya snānaśāṭako 'bhyavakāśe śoṣito vāyunohyamāno rājño bimbisārasyopari patitaḥ. rājā kathayati: bhavanto,
K14sumagavu:447: śrūyate rājño māndhātasya saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaḥ patita iti,
K14sumagavu:451: bhavanto jyotiṣko gṛhapatir bhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīśriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti,
K14sumagavu:452: idaṃ ca divyaṃ vastram ākāśāt patitam,
K14sumagavu:459: idaṃ ca divyaṃ ākāśāt patitam, gṛhāṇeti.
K14sumagavu:460: SumAv_149: tena hastaḥ prasāritaḥ. devānaya paśyāmīti. sa nirīkṣitum ārabdho yāvat paśyaty ātmīyaṃ snānaśāṭakam.
K14sumagavu:464: kiṃ tava divyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā. deva,
K14sumagavu:466: yady evaṃ kimarthaṃ māṃ na nimantrayase. deva,
K14sumagavu:470: kiṃ tena sajjīkartavyam. nanu sajjīkṛtam evāgaccheti.
K14sumagavu:471: SumAv_152: sa jyotiṣkasya gṛhaṃ gatvā bāhyaṃ parijanaṃ dṛṣṭvā indriyāṇy utkṣipati. jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati: deva,
K14sumagavu:472: kimartham indriyāṇy utkṣipasīti. sa kathayati: kumāra,
K14sumagavu:474: bāhyo 'yaṃ parijanaḥ. sa paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ.
K14sumagavu:475: SumAv_153: punar madhyamaṃ parijanaṃ dṛṣṭvā indriyāṇy utkṣeptum ārabdhaḥ. jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati: deva,
K14sumagavu:476: kimartham indriyāṇy utkṣipasīti. rājā kathayati: kumāra,
K14sumagavu:479: kiṃtu madhyamo 'yaṃ parijanah. sa bhūyasyā mātrayā paraṃ vismayam āpannah.
K14sumagavu:480: SumAv_154: tatra madhyamāyām dvāraśālāyāṃ maṇibhir upacitā bhūmiḥ. tasyāṃ matsyā
K14sumagavu:481: udakapūrṇāyām iva yantraprayogenoparibhramanto dṛśyante. rājā praveṣṭukamo jalam
K14sumagavu:489: yantraprayogenaite paribhramanti. rājā na śraddadhāte tenāṅgulimudrā kṣiptā sā raṇaraṇāśabdena bhūmau patitā. tato rājā vismayam āpannaḥ.
K14sumagavu:490: SumAv_156: praviśya siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ. tato vadhūjanaḥ pādābhivandaka upasaṃkrāntaḥ. tāsām aśrupāto jātaḥ. rājā kathayati: kumāra,
K14sumagavu:495: SumAv_157: rājā tatra tayā divyamānuṣikayā śriyā upacaryamāṇo na niṣkrāmati;
K14sumagavu:505: na śakto 'si tvam ekaṃ divasaṃ rājyaṃ kārayitum. devo jānīte,
K14sumagavu:506: mamaiko divasaḥ praviṣṭasyati. adya devasya saptamo divaso vartate.
K14sumagavu:507: SumAv_161: rājā jyotiṣkasya mukham nirīkṣya kathayati: kumāra,
K14sumagavu:510: SumAv_162: kumāra, kathaṃ rātriḥ prajñāyate divaso vā. deva,
K14sumagavu:514: santi tāni kusumāni yāni rātrau vikasanti na divā,
K14sumagavu:515: santi yāni divā vikasanti na rātrau;
K14sumagavu:516: santi te maṇayo ye rātrau jvalanti na divā,
K14sumagavu:517: santi ye divā jvalanti na rātrau;
K14sumagavu:518: santi te śakunayo ye rātrau kūjanti na divā,
K14sumagavu:519: santi ye divā kūjanti na rātrau. rājā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
K14sumagavu:521: yathā tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtaḥ tathaiva nānyathety uktvā jyotiṣkasya gṛhān niṣkrāntaḥ.
K14sumagavu:522: SumAv_164: ajātaśatrukumāreṇa jyotiṣkasantako maṇir apahṛtya dārakasya haste dattaḥ. tena yata eva gṛhītas tatraiva gatvāvasthitaḥ.
K14sumagavu:525: paśyāmīti. sa muṣṭiṃ vighāṭya kathayati: kumāra,
K14sumagavu:528: SumAv_166: sa tāḍayitum ārabdhaḥ. jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati: kumāra,
K14sumagavu:536: nāpy anenāpi tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītas tatraiva gatvāvasthito; 'pi tu,
K14sumagavu:538: svakaṃ te gṛhaṃ yāvadbhir maṇibhir anyena vā prayojanam tāvad gṛhāṇa yathāsukham iti.
K14sumagavu:542: SumAv_169: yadājātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
K14sumagavu:543: svayam eva ca paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ,
K14sumagavu:549: sa mām marṣayatīti. kuta etan. nūnam ayaṃ madgṛham āgacchatu,
K14sumagavu:551: bibhaktam eva. kim atra vibhaktavyam. madīyaṃ gṛham āgaccha. ahaṃ tvadīyaṃ gṛham āgacchāmīti.
K14sumagavu:553: evam kuru. sa tasya gṛhaṃ gataḥ. eṣo 'pi ajātaśatror gṛhaṃ gatah. sā śrīs tasmād gṛhād antarhitā yatraiṣa jyotiṣkas tatraiva gatā. evaṃ yāvat sapta vārān antarhitā prādurbhūtā ca.
K14sumagavu:555: evam api mayā na śakitaṃ jyotiṣkasya maṇīn apahartum,
K14sumagavu:559: SumAv_174: te hi śiṭākarkaṭakaprayogenābhiroḍhum ārabdhāḥ. te 'ntaḥpurikayā upariprāsādatalagatayā dṛṣṭāḥ,
K14sumagavu:563: tiṣṭhantu dhūrtakā iti. teṣāṃ yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ,
K14sumagavu:568: bhavanto 'nena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopita,
K14sumagavu:570: tat kiṃ na me muṣiṣyata iti. purakṣobho jātaḥ.
K14sumagavu:577: sa māṃ na praghātayisyatīti. kuta etat. sarvathāhaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto:
K14sumagavu:578: mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kariṣyatīti. gacchāmi,
K14sumagavu:580: SumAv_180: anena sarvaṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānathakṛpaṇebhyo dattam,
K14sumagavu:582: SumAv_181: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān kapphiṇo vicitraratnācalam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:583: SumAv_182: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:584: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ vicitraratnācalam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:588: SumAv_184: yo 'yaṃ rājā mahākapphiṇa ekasmin samaye aṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛto mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ.
K14sumagavu:589: SumAv_185: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate: asti,
K14sumagavu:591: kasyacid evaṃrūpo balaughas tadyathā mamaitarhīti. te kathayanti: deva,
K14sumagavu:593: SumAv_186: yāvad anena mahākapphiṇena rājñā śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtaṃ preṣitam:
K14sumagavu:597: SumAv_187: etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignāḥ samāgamya śrāvastīṃ gatvā bhagavate etad vṛttāntaṃ nivedayanti.
K14sumagavu:599: uktāś ca: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti. tair dūtasya niveditam:
K14sumagavu:602: SumAv_189: bhagavatā jetavanam catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaraṃ catvāro mahārājā dauvārikāḥ sthāpitāḥ,
K14sumagavu:607: svayaṃ ca bhagavāṃś cakravartiveśam ātmānam abhinirmāya saptatālodgate mahāratnasiṃhāsane niṣaṇnāḥ.
K14sumagavu:608: SumAv_190: dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ.
K14sumagavu:614: aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyamīti.
K14sumagavu:615: SumAv_192: dūtena mahākapphiṇasya tat sarvaṃ saṃdiṣṭaṃ niveditam.
K14sumagavu:616: SumAv_193: ayaṃ kapphiṇo rājāṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛtaḥ śrāvastīm anupraveśya jetavanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
K14sumagavu:617: sahadarśanād asya yo rūpe rūpamada aiśvarye aiśvaryamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ,
K14sumagavu:619: SumAv_194: tato bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittam utpāditam: aho bata,
K14sumagavu:620: śakro devānām indra aindraṃ dhanur ādāyāgacched iti.
K14sumagavu:621: SumAv_195: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devānām indraḥ sārathiveśenaindraṃ dhanur upanāmitavān. tato bhagavatā tad dhanur upanāmitam. tad utkṣeptum api na śaknoti,
K14sumagavu:623: SumAv_196: tato bhagavatā saptāyomayyo bheryo nirmitāḥ,
K14sumagavu:624: svayam eva tad dhanur ardhacandrākāreṇāropya śaraḥ kṣipto yena saptāyomayyo bheryaś chidrīkṛtās,
K14sumagavu:629: dhūnīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāraṃ iva kuñjaraḥ //
K14sumagavu:630: SumAv_198: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K14sumagavu:632: SumAv_199: sa ca śabdo yāvad akaniṣṭhān devān gataḥ,
K14sumagavu:634: SumAv_200: tato bhagavatāsya cittam ājñāya rājaveśam antardhāpya dharmo deśitah. yenāṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivāreṇa yāvac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtavān,
K14sumagavu:635: tato dṛṣṭasatyaś ca bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajitaḥ. so 'yam āgaccati. (17)
K14sumagavu:636: SumAv_201: atrāntareṇāyuṣmān ānandaḥ haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanādopakūjitam ārāmam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā
K14sumagavu:637: SumAv_202: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:638: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanādopakūjitam ārāmam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:641: ayaṃ ca bhagavatā indriyaguptadvārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
K14sumagavu:642: SumAv_204: ayaṃ ca bhagavataś caturbhir aṅgulair ūnaḥ suvarṇavarṇo dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ.
K14sumagavu:643: SumAv_205: anena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe madhyamaṃ chattram āropitam. tasya karmaṇo vipākenārdhatṛtīyāni cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi;
K14sumagavu:644: yady etarhi na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyad etarhi apy anena balacakravartirājyam akariṣyat.
K14sumagavu:645: SumAv_206: ayaṃ ca bhagavatā balāt pravrajitaḥ. ayaṃ ca bhagavato mātṛsvasāputro bhrātā bhavati. sa eṣāgacchati. (18)
K14sumagavu:646: SumAv_207: atrāntarenāyuṣmān rāhulaś cakravartiveśam abhinirmāya saptaratnasamanvāgataś
K14sumagavu:647: caturaśītyā bhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ samanugamyamānaś caturaśītyā nāgasahasrair upoṣadhanāgarājapramukhaiś
K14sumagavu:651: SumAv_208: taṃ dṛsṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
K14sumagavu:657: SumAv_210: bhagavataḥ putro 'yaṃ pitur ujjhitāṃ śriyam uddyotamānaḥ,
K14sumagavu:658: sarvacakravartiprativiśiṣṭatarām ṛddhim upadarśayann upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
K14sumagavu:662: kṛtvā buddhasuto 'bhyupaiti nabhasā veśaṃ ca rājñām ayaṃ
K14sumagavu:663: nāmnā rāhula ity aveti sumahate sampūjyamānaḥ suraiḥ //
K14sumagavu:664: SumAv_212: bhittvorvīṃ jalavat prayānti munayaḥ kecit sṛjanto 'nalaṃ
K14sumagavu:665: ramyatoyadharā ivāśu jagati spaṣṭaṃ kṣaranto jalam /
K14sumagavu:669: SumAv_213: saṃprasthitesu bhikṣusaṃghesu atrāntareṇa tathāgatapraveśaḥ. bhagavāṃs tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno,
K14sumagavu:670: yathāsamāhite citte bhagavataḥ kāyād raśmayo niścaranti,
K14sumagavu:672: yair ayaṃ loke udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsito yāvac ca śrāvastīṃ yāvac ca puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaram.
K14sumagavu:673: SumAv_214: atrāntareṇa sarve lokā bhagavantam abhiniṣkramantaṃ paśyanti,
K14sumagavu:675: SumAv_215: atha brahmā sahāṃpatir bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājñāya sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarair devair āgatya bhagavato dakṣiṇe pārśve vyavasthitaḥ.
K14sumagavu:676: SumAv_216: śakro 'pi devānām indraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarair devair āgatya vāme pārśve vyavasthitaḥ.
K14sumagavu:677: SumAv_217: tumburusupriyapramukhāni pañcamātrāṇi gandharvaśatāny āgatya bhagavato 'grato vividhair vādyagītanṛttaviśeṣair upasthānaṃ kurvanto
K14sumagavu:678: SumAv_218: anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti.
K14sumagavu:679: SumAv_219: upariṣṭāc ca bhagavato 'psaraso divyāny utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi,
K14sumagavu:683: SumAv_220: tena khalu punaḥ samayenānyatarasmin araṇyāyatane sapta ṛṣisahasrāṇi prativasanti.
K14sumagavu:684: SumAv_221: adrākṣus te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātrimśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam,
K14sumagavu:692: SumAv_222: na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathacittasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
K14sumagavu:697: SumAv_223: atha te ṛṣayo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā,
K14sumagavu:698: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte tasthuḥ.
K14sumagavu:699: SumAv_224: tato bhagavatā teṣām ṛṣīṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K14sumagavu:700: yāṃ śrutvā tair ṛṣibhir viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtam.
K14sumagavu:701: SumAv_225: atha te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paricārya saṃprasthitāḥ.
K14sumagavu:702: SumAv_226: tena khalu samayena puṇḍravardhane nagare 'ṣṭādaśa dvārāṇy ababhūvan.
K14sumagavu:706: yan nv aham aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāya svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praveśayam iti.
K14sumagavu:707: SumAv_228: atha bhagavān aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāyā svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ.
K14sumagavu:708: SumAv_229: bhagavataḥ purapraveśe evaṃrūpāṇy āścaryāṇy atyadbhutāni bhavanty anyāni ca:
K14sumagavu:719: gṛhagatāni ca vividhāni vādyabhāṇḍāni svayaṃ nadanti,
K14sumagavu:730: SumAv_230: evaṃvidhayā vibhūtyā praviśya yena sumāgadhāyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ.
K14sumagavu:731: SumAv_231: atha sumāgadhā svayam eva gośīrṣacandanodakena bhṛṅgāraṃ pūrayitvā bhagavataḥ pādodakam anuprayacchati bhikṣusaṃghasya ca.
K14sumagavu:732: SumAv_232: tataḥ sumāgadhā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatyaivam āha:
K14sumagavu:733: dhanyās te paravādivādamathanaṃ paśyanti ye te mukhaṃ
K14sumagavu:734: vistīrṇe sadasi sthitasya vacanaṃ śṛṇvanti ye vā mudā /
K14sumagavu:735: lābhas tasya mahān bhaviṣyati ca yaḥ pādau tava śrīnidher
K14sumagavu:736: mūrdhnā caiva karadvayena vinayāt saṃpīḍya vandiṣyate //
K14sumagavu:737: SumAv_233: atha bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
K14sumagavu:738: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati.
K14sumagavu:739: SumAv_234: atha puṇḍravardhananivāsī janakāyo bhagavantam apaśyaṃs tadgṛhaṃ bhettum ārabdhaḥ. tato bhagavatā tadgṛhaṃ sphaṭikamayam abhinirmitaṃ,
K14sumagavu:740: yataḥ sarvo mahājanakāya ādarśanagatam iva bhagavantaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ paśyati bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca.
K14sumagavu:742: sphaṭikamayam abhūt tad eva ramyaṃ maṇikanakākṣaratnabhakticitraṃ /
K14sumagavu:743: sthitam iva purato munīndracandraṃ nagarajano 'pi nirīkṣate samagraḥ //
K14sumagavu:744: SumAv_236: prasādāromāñcitasarvagātrāḥ kṛtāñjaliṃ mūrdhni nipātya hastam /
K14sumagavu:745: narā namanti sma munīndracandraṃ surā ivendraṃ bhavanodarastham //
K14sumagavu:746: SumAv_237: atha bhagavān kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ.
K14sumagavu:747: SumAv_238: tataḥ sumāgadhāpramukho 'ntarjanakāyas te ca nāgarās te ca ṛṣayas te ca devāsuragaruḍayakṣagandharvakinnaramahoragā bhagavantaṃ parivāryāvasthitāḥ.
K14sumagavu:748: SumAv_239: tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ ca tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃpravedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K14sumagavu:749: yāṃ śrutvā kaiścic chrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
K14sumagavu:752: kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
K14sumagavu:761: SumAv_240: yad bhūyasā sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā.
K14sumagavu:766: yat sumāgadhayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam iti.
K14sumagavu:768: na bhikṣava etarhy eva yathātīte 'py adhvani buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya kāñcanamālayā yad buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K14sumagavu:770: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kurute, bhāṣiṣye.
K14sumagavu:773: 'tīte 'dhvani viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi,
K14sumagavu:774: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
K14sumagavu:775: sa bārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve.
K14sumagavu:776: SumAv_244: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kṛkī nāma rājā babhūva.
K14sumagavu:777: SumAv_245: tasya duhitā kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā,
K14sumagavu:779: SumAv_246: sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā,
K14sumagavu:780: rājñaḥ kṛkina iṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā saṃvṛttā.
K14sumagavu:783: SumAv_248: tayā taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'nitike mahān cittaprasāda utpanno,
K14sumagavu:785: SumAv_249: tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā kṛkinā daśa svapnā dṛṣṭāḥ:
K14sumagavu:797: SumAv_250: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhītaś trastaś cintayati:
K14sumagavu:798: mā me itonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
K14sumagavu:799: SumAv_251: tato rājñā svapnādhyāyavido brāhmaṇān āhūya svapnān niveditavān.
K14sumagavu:800: SumAv_252: te kāñcanamālāṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayanti: rājan,
K14sumagavu:801: yā te sarvajanapriyā tasyā rudhireṇa yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ,
K14sumagavu:804: svapnān dāruṇān dṛṣṭvā rājyajīvitahāriṇo 'nenopāyena svastir devasya bhaviṣyati.
K14sumagavu:807: tāṃ vyāpādayitukāmā brāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ. varaṃ mamaiva maraṇaṃ,
K14sumagavu:809: SumAv_254: kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ,
K14sumagavu:813: iti. tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa niveditaḥ. sā kathayati:
K14sumagavu:814: eṣa bhagavān kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bārāṇasīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve,
K14sumagavu:815: taṃ bhagavantaṃ gatvā pṛcchatha. yathā te bhagavān vyākaroti tathaivaṃ dhāraya.
K14sumagavu:816: SumAv_255: tato rājā mahatā śrīsamudāyena kāñcanamālayā sārdhaṃ barāṇasyā nirgatya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
K14sumagavu:817: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ,
K14sumagavu:820: SumAv_256: atha bhagavān kṛkinaṃ rājānaṃ dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati
K14sumagavu:821: samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
K14sumagavu:823: SumAv_257: atha kṛkī rājā daśa svapnān nivedyaivam āha: mā me,
K14sumagavu:825: tatonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
K14sumagavu:829: na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyatīti jīvitasya cāntarāyaḥ.
K14sumagavu:832: vātāyanena hastī nirgacchan puccho lagna iti,
K14sumagavu:833: bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
K14sumagavu:834: sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti. tasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle aśrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayas,
K14sumagavu:835: te rudanto 'śrumukhān bandhūn utsṛjya pravrajya vihāreṣu gṛhasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyanti,
K14sumagavu:839: tasyaiva śravakā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti śraddhānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ,
K14sumagavu:844: tasyaiva śrāvakāḥ śaktuprasthasya hetor indriyabalabodhyaṅgāni saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
K14sumagavu:848: tasyaiva śrāvakās taṃ tīrthikavākyam anugṛhya saddharmeṇa samīkariṣyanti,
K14sumagavu:852: tasyaiva śrāvakā asaṃyatās te śīlavanto bhikṣūn niṣkāśayiṣyanti,
K14sumagavu:856: tasyaiva śrāvakā āryasaṃghasya pratipāditam ārāmaṃ saṃgham ālaṃbīkṛtya kecid abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñāḥ saṃghād ācchidya puṣpaphalaṃ svajanebhyo dāsyanti,
K14sumagavu:860: tasyaiva śrāvakā abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñā ātmanāpattim āpannāḥ śrāddhānām api bhikṣūṇām āpattiṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyanti,
K14sumagavu:864: tasmin samaye vikalendriyā api rājāno bhaviṣyanti,
K14sumagavu:867: paṭo 'ṣṭādaśabhir janair ākṛṣyate na ca śīryata iti,
K14sumagavu:877: na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitāntarāyo vā.
K14sumagavu:878: SumAv_259: tato bhagavatā tasya rājñas tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K14sumagavu:879: yāṃ śrutvā caturaśītyā prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam.
K14sumagavu:880: SumAv_260: kāñcanamālayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam.
K14sumagavu:882: bhikṣavaḥ yāsau kāñcanamālā iyam eva sā sumāgadheti.
K14sumagavu:883: SumAv_262: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K14sumagavu:885: kāñcanamālayā karma kṛtaṃ yenāḍhye kule pratyajātā yena kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā iti.
K14sumagavu:889: pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni. kāñcanamālayaiva,
K14sumagavu:891: karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati. na,
K14sumagavu:897: api tūpātteṣu eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca.
K14sumagavu:898: SumAv_264: na pranaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
K14sumagavu:899: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
K14sumagavu:903: tayā pratyekabuddhasya caitye nānāvicitrāṃ palālamālāṃ granthayitvā samāropya prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam.
K14sumagavu:904: SumAv_266: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatrayatropapadye 'haṃ tatratatra kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jāyeyam iti. kiṃ manyadhve,
K14sumagavu:906: iyam asau kāñcanamālā. yad anayā prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K14sumagavu:907: tena pañcajanmaśatāni kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā.
K14sumagavu:908: SumAv_267: paṇadvayaṃ ca tayā paṭāntāvabaddhaṃ vimucyāryasaṃghāya dattaṃ;
K14sumagavu:910: SumAv_268: atha bhagavān sumāgadhāpramukhaṃ puṇḍravardhananivāsinaṃ mahājanakāyam abhiprasādya prakrāntaḥ,
K14sumagavu:911: tathaiva rddhyā sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena śrāvastīm āgataḥ.
K14sumagavu:918: ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīya iti. tasmāt tarhi,
K14sumagavu:921: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāma ity evaṃ vo,
K14sumagavu:925: te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti. sumāgadhāvadānaṃ samāptam.
